COVID-19 cases reach more than 8.4M, death toll now at 450,386 tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-743300 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/world/743300/covid-19-cases-reach-more-than-8-4m-death-toll-now-at-450-386/story/ At least 8,410,400 cases of coronavirus have been registered in 196 countries and territories while at least 450,386 have died since the outbreak began in China last December, according to a tally from official sources compiled by AFP on Thursday. Fri, 19 Jun 2020 05:47:42 +0800
Vietnam in talks to ease entry for visitors from China, South Korea, Japan tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-743296 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/world/743296/vietnam-in-talks-to-ease-entry-for-visitors-from-china-south-korea-japan/story/ Vietnam is holding talks aimed at easing the entry of citizens from China, South Korea and Japan into the country after restrictions on foreign visitors amid the coronavirus disease (COVID-19) pandemic, the Ministry of Foreign Affairs said on Thursday. Fri, 19 Jun 2020 04:16:13 +0800
Former Japanese justice minister, lawmaker wife arrested for suspected vote-buying tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-743295 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/world/743295/former-japanese-justice-minister-lawmaker-wife-arrested-for-suspected-vote-buying/story/ A former Japanese justice minister and his lawmaker wife were arrested on Thursday on suspicion of vote-buying, prosecutors said, in a serious blow to Prime Minister Shinzo Abe as he struggles with falling public support. Fri, 19 Jun 2020 03:48:35 +0800
15 anyos na babae ginilitan, pinagsasaksak umano ng BFF dahil sa selos tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-743292 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/ulatfilipino/743292/15-anyos-na-babae-ginilitan-pinagsasaksak-umano-ng-bff-dahil-sa-selos/story/ Isang 15 anyos na babae ang ginilitan at pinagsasaksak sa Agusan del Norte dahil sa selos at ang suspek ay best friend daw niya, ayon sa ulat ni John Consulta sa Saksi Huwebes ng gabi. Guro na nag-online selling ng tocino nang magsara ang paaralan, inalok na magturo sa int'l school tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-743287 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/ulatfilipino/743287/guro-na-nag-online-selling-ng-tocino-nang-magsara-ang-paaralan-inalok-na-magturo-sa-int-l-school/story/ Mula sa pagiging guro, napilitang magtinda ng tocino, tapa at iba pa via online si Sunshine Melorin matapos na magsara ang paaralan na kaniyang pinapasukan sa krisis na idinulot ng COVID-19. Ngayon, may bagong pag-asa siyang natatanaw. Fri, 19 Jun 2020 00:50:05 +0800
Davao de Oro teachers camp out on roadside to get internet signal, attend DepEd webinar tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-743261 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/regions/743261/davao-de-oro-teachers-camp-out-on-roadside-to-get-internet-signal-attend-deped-webinar/story/ Several teachers had to set up tents on the side of the highway in Maco, Davao de Oro to get internet access and attend a three-day online seminar organized by the Department of Education (DepEd). Fri, 19 Jun 2020 00:48:32 +0800
Top Pentagon official resigns as critics accuse Trump of seeking 'loyalists' tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-743283 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/world/743283/top-pentagon-official-resigns-as-critics-accuse-trump-of-seeking-loyalists/story/ Kathryn Wheelbarger, one of the Pentagon's most prominent and respected policy officials, is resigning after three years in the job at a time when critics have accused President Donald Trump of prioritizing perceived "loyalists" for top national security posts, sources told Reuters on Thursday. Fri, 19 Jun 2020 00:30:59 +0800

Fri, 19 Jun 2020 00:30:05 +0800
Ilang guro, pumuwesto sa gilid ng highway para makasagap ng internet signal at makasali sa DepEd webinar tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-743282 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/ulatfilipino/743282/ilang-guro-puwesto-sa-gilid-ng-highway-para-makasagap-ng-internet-signal-at-makasali-sa-deped-webinar/story/ Naging kapansin-pansin sa ilang motoristang dumadaan sa isang highway sa Maco, Davao de Oro ang mga taong nakapuwesto sa gilid ng kalsada at nakatutok sa kani-kanilang cellphone. Thu, 18 Jun 2020 23:55:25 +0800

US Supreme Court blocks Trump bid to end 'Dreamers' immigrant program tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-743276 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/world/743276/us-supreme-court-blocks-trump-bid-to-end-dreamers-immigrant-program/story/ The US Supreme Court on Thursday dealt President Donald Trump a major setback on his hardline immigration policies, blocking his bid to end a program that protects from deportation hundreds of thousands of immigrants - often called "Dreamers" - who entered the United States illegally as children. Thu, 18 Jun 2020 23:34:07 +0800
